```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(ggplot2)

# First plot: Date vs Station ID
ggplot(merged_bottle_data, aes(x = Date, y = Station_ID)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 1) +
  labs(title = "Visualization of Date vs Station ID", x = "Date", y = "Station ID") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

# Second plot: Latitude vs Longitude (Station Positions)
ggplot(merged_bottle_data, aes(x = Longitude, y = Latitude)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 1, color = "blue") +
  labs(title = "Geographical Positions of Stations", x = "Longitude", y = "Latitude") +
  theme_minimal()

```
